com.autonomy.aci.client.transport

Class AciResponseInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.AciResponseInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AciResponseInputStreamImpl

    public abstract class AciResponseInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    Provides a wrapper around the actual ACI response InputStream and propagates the content type of the HTTP response. Also allows InputStream methods to be overridden, like FilterInputStream.close() so that HTTP resources can be released when the stream is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusCode

        public abstract int getStatusCode()
        Return the status code of the HTTP request. This is useful if you are, for example, proxying View server requests, as by default it can send 404 and 500 error codes if it can't find, or can't render documents.
        Returns:
        Returns the response status code

      • getHeader

        public abstract String getHeader(String name)

      • getContentEncoding

        public abstract String getContentEncoding()

      • getContentLength

        public abstract long getContentLength()

      • getContentType

        public abstract String getContentType()
        Return the content type of the response. Most likely to be text/xml, but could be image/jpeg, for example, if the response is from a ClusterServe2DMap action.
        Returns:
        The content type of the response
